verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2003>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Saviour<s%>, and2532, 2962 <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%>;

unto <S%G5095>Timothy<s%>, my <S%G1103>true<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>: <S%G5485>Grace<s%>, <S%G1656>mercy<s%>, <S%G1515>peace<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

As <S%G2531><s%> I <S%G3870>exhorted<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> to <S%G4357>tarry<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>, when I was <S%G4198>going<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> thou mightest <S%G3853>charge<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> men <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G2085>teach<s%> a different <S%G2085>doctrine<s%>,

neither <S%G3366><s%> to give heed <S%G4337>to<s%> <S%G3454>fables<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G562>endless<s%> <S%G1076>genealogies<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G3930>minister<s%> <S%G2214>questionings<s%>, <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> a <S%G3620>dispensation<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>; so do I now.

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3852>charge<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> love out <S%G1537>of<s%> a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G505>unfeigned<s%>:
from <S%G3739>which<s%> things <S%G5100>some<s%> having <S%G795>swerved<s%> have turned <S%G1624>aside<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> vain <S%G3150>talking<s%>;

desiring <S%G2309><s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> teachers of the <S%G3547>law<s%>, though they <S%G3539>understand<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> they <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4012>whereof<s%> they confidently <S%G1226>affirm<s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G2570>good<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G5530>use<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G3545>lawfully<s%>,

as <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2749>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> made <S%G2749>for<s%> a righteous <S%G1342>man<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> for the <S%G459>lawless<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G506>unruly<s%>, for the <S%G765>ungodly<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>, for the <S%G462>unholy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G952>profane<s%>, for murderers of <S%G3964>fathers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> murderers of <S%G3389>mothers<s%>, for <S%G409>manslayers<s%>,

for <S%G4205>fornicators<s%>, for abusers of themselves with <S%G733>men<s%>, for <S%G405>menstealers<s%>, for <S%G5583>liars<s%>, for false <S%G1965>swearers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there <S%G480>be<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> other <S%G2087>thing<s%> contrary <S%G480>to<s%> the <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine<s%>;

according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G3107>blessed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> was committed <S%G4100>to<s%> <S%G1473>my<s%> <S%G4100>trust<s%>.

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2192>I<s%> <S%G5485>thank<s%> him that <S%G1743>enabled<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, even <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, for <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2233>counted<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%>, appointing <S%G5087>me<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> his <S%G1248>service<s%>;

though I <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G4386>before<s%> a <S%G989>blasphemer<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G1376>persecutor<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5197>injurious<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> I obtained <S%G1653>mercy<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G4160>did<s%> it <S%G50>ignorantly<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G570>unbelief<s%>;

and <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5250>abounded<s%> exceedingly <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

Faithful <S%G4103><s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G594>acceptance<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>; of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4413>chief<s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> this <S%G5124>cause<s%> I obtained <S%G1653>mercy<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> as <S%G4413>chief<s%> might <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> show <S%G1731>forth<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G3115>longsuffering<s%>, <S%G4314>for<s%> a <S%G5296>ensample<s%> of them that should <S%G3195>thereafter<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> unto the <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G165>eternal<s%>, <S%G862>immortal<s%>, <S%G517>invisible<s%>, the only3441, 4680 <S%G2316>God<s%>, be <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.

This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3852>charge<s%> I <S%G3908>commit<s%> unto <S%G4671>you<s%>, my <S%G5043>child<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4394>prophecies<s%> which <S%G4254>led<s%> the <S%G1909>way<s%> <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> you may <S%G4754>war<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4752>warfare<s%>;

holding <S%G2192><s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%>; <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> having thrust from <S%G683>them<s%> made <S%G3489>shipwreck<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>:

of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5211>Hymenaeus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G223>Alexander<s%>; <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G3860>delivered<s%> unto <S%G4567>Satan<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they might be <S%G3811>taught<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G987>blaspheme<s%>.
